subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Andrew Wiggins scored 30 points, Wayne Selden Jr. had 14, and No. 10 Kansas pulled away in the final seconds of overtime for a 77-70 victory over Oklahoma State in the Big 12 Tournament.
snippet: Andrew Wiggins scored 30 points, Wayne Selden Jr. had 14, and No. 10 Kansas pulled away in the final seconds of overtime for a 77-70 victory over Oklahoma State in the Big 12 Tournament.
